actionConfiguration.body: SELECT CUSTOMER_BANK_CURRENCY_CODE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_NAME,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BRANCH_NAME,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ID_TYPE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ID_NUMBER,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_IBAN,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SWIFTCODE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_NAME,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_MOBILE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_PHONE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_EMAIL,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SELFUNDERTAKE,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE1,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE2,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_CITY,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_ZIP,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_STATE,CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_NAME,CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO,CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ID_TYPE,CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ID_NUMBER,CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_IBAN,CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_SWIFTCODE,CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_PURPOSE FROM APS_CUSTOMER_BANK_DETAILS where CUSTOMER_OID ='{{ appsmith.store.customerOID}}';
